text: How can I tell when my package will be merged? <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/33044>. I don’t see the clock anywhere

elements.text: How can I tell when my package will be merged?
. I don’t see the clock anywhere

text: the PR was opened at 2021-03-28T23:03, so ~5 more hours

elements.text: the PR was opened at 2021-03-28T23:03, so ~5 more hours

text: If you want it merged and don’t want to wait - just let us know and someone will hit merge.

elements.text: If you want it merged and don’t want to wait - just let us know and someone will hit merge.

text: OK I see thanks. Where do you see that info? It would be good to just have a label saying "this Will be automatically merged at..."

elements.text: OK I see thanks. Where do you see that info? It would be good to just have a label saying "this Will be automatically merged at..."

text: OK thanks, I can wait 5 hours ;)

elements.text: OK thanks, I can wait 5 hours ;)

text: if you hover over "3 days ago" it tells you when it was opened in your timezone

elements.text: if you hover over "3 days ago" it tells you when it was opened in your timezone

text: Ah, so it does — that’s what I was missing, thanks!

elements.text: Ah, so it does — that’s what I was missing, thanks!

text: I think that in the "* days ago" they round to the closest integer day, so after 2 days and 13 hours you'd already see "3 days ago"

elements.text: I think that in the "* days ago" they round to the closest integer day, so after 2 days and 13 hours you'd already see "3 days ago"
